## Quaternion.AreClose() method

Checks if the two quaternions are close to each other

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static AreClose(quat0: ReadOnlyQuaternion, quat1: ReadOnlyQuaternion): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  quat0 | <code>ReadOnlyQuaternion</code> | defines the first quaternion to check |
|  quat1 | <code>ReadOnlyQuaternion</code> | defines the second quaternion to check |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

true if the two quaternions are close to each other
